n=as.integer(readline(prompt="enter the number of elements in the array:"))
a=array(0)
for(i in 1:n){
  a[i]=as.numeric(readline(prompt="Enter a value:"))
}
print(a)
if(n%%2!=0){
  print("ERROR!The array length must be an even number")
}else{
  l=n/2
  x=sum(a[1:l])
  y=sum(a[(l+1):n])
  print(x*y)
}
